name: 100 Ways To Die 3:Can You Escape
description:
“Death is everywhere. Most of us try to avoid it and succeed to do so, others not so lucky and can’t get out of its way.” Everyday we fight with germs, toxins, sickness, disaster……The fact that we survive at all is a miracle, because everyday we live we face 100 WAYS TO DIE……or more.

Here comes the 3rd episode of 100 WAYS TO DIE. This time, an even more dangerous and exciting journey is right here waiting for you to explore. May I ask you: “Would you dare?”

**The GOAL is simple**
KILL THE DUMB MONSTER, even though he looks so innocent. He is just like us, who live on this complex world.

**The ART is stunning**
We ought to bring you the perfect game scenes, which makes you be able, as it were, to go through the adventure with the dumb monster in action.

**The LEVELS are challenging**
Don’t take this game as a silly game, yet see it as it’s a piece of cake. Interesting themes loaded with corresponding levels. I can assure you that it’s not even easy to pass the FIRST level.

**The GAMEPLAY is fun**
You can touch, drag, swipe to achieve your goal. Also, you can shake and tile your device. You can even use the microphone feature of your device. More ways to play than you can even think of.

**The Meaning is significant**
One thing we can be sure about is that we can never bypass death eventually. The question here is how we deal with this fact. Most of us are not scared of the process of death, but “DEATH” itself， because we can never be sure about it. The meaning of this game is that it guides you to face death. Sometimes it’s accident but sometimes it’s fate. Are you brave enough to challenge death like the dumb monster again and again? Maybe you will know by then.

If you are stuck, don’t give up or look for walkthrough so quickly. There are some useful hints for each level and you can always ask your friends on social media for help.
